Thomas Johnson wrote:
> 
> Has anyone tried precomputing a whole load of values of the sigmoid 
> function at different points, and then just using a hash_map to do a lookup?

I think SharpNEAT has a LUT version of the function - though you 
wouldn't use a hash_map... just a normal table.

--Steve
